issue.title: [Java] Extend types supported by GenerateSampleData
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17585](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17585). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
org.apache.arrow.vector.GenerateSampleTypes does not support the Uint vector types.

comments.body:
